description: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">revision contaning update for the CVMFS EGI default configurations.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>
releaseNotes: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">revision contaning update for the CVMFS EGI default configurations.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span>
installationNotes: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">All products in UMD 4.16.1 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.</span>
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: <span style="color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">&nbsp;</span><span style="margin: 0px; padding: 0px; color: rgb(102, 102, 102); font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 12.8369px; background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);">For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.</span>
